description: An illustration of a banana split in a shallow red bowl with alternating strips of bright red and slightly darker red with a scalloped border along the top: one of the banana halves is visible in front of three scoops of vanilla ice cream with chocolate fudge drizzled onto each scoop; the middle scoop of vanilla ice cream is topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a single maraschino cherry.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive

content: November 03, 2023. With a cherry on top. #NYTVertex
